definition: diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: Finally, various geographic characteristic oriented knowledge rules were described.
sentences.chinese: 最後闡述各種面向地理特徵的製圖綜合知識規則。

sentences.english: The mapper trapped in the gap tapped the tap wrapper with strap.
sentences.chinese: 陷在縫中的製圖者用皮帶輕擊塞子套套。

sentences.english: Based on fractal geometry, a method for generating wave lines in mechanical drawings is presented.
sentences.chinese: 基於分形原理，提出機械製圖中波浪線的生成方法。

sentences.english: Ecological landscape mapping is one of the fields of thematic mapping.
sentences.chinese: 生態景觀製圖是專題製圖學的重要發展方向之一。

sentences.english: Ecological landscape mapping is one of the fields of thematic mapping.
sentences.chinese: 生態景觀製圖是專題製圖學的重要發展方向之一。

sentences.english: Boundary Jump-Drawing has been regarded as a special step in map making.
sentences.chinese: 境界跳繪處理是地圖製圖中比較特殊的一個製圖步驟。

sentences.english: Boundary Jump-Drawing has been regarded as a special step in map making.
sentences.chinese: 境界跳繪處理是地圖製圖中比較特殊的一個製圖步驟。

sentences.english: Experienced with mechanical drawing and extrusion die design.
sentences.chinese: 具有機械製圖和擠出模具計劃閱歷。

sentences.english: The draughtsman rapidly blocked in his idea .
sentences.chinese: 製圖員很快地把他的構思畫成草圖。

sentences.english: The new challenge is just what cartography generalization now confronts with in digital environment.
sentences.chinese: 製圖綜合是地圖學的一個核心和難點問題。

sentences.english: Automatic mapping is a series of transformations of numbers and patterns.
sentences.chinese: 自動化製圖過程，就是一系列的數模轉換。

sentences.english: When designing and making charts, he sometimes has to use a one chi square.
sentences.chinese: 他設計製圖的時候，有時要用到方尺。

sentences.english: He sat at his drafting table, and did nothing.
sentences.chinese: 製圖桌前，他靜若處子，神遊於外。

sentences.english: Therefore, an ideal frame is established for cartographic expert system of qualitative information.
sentences.chinese: 從而爲定性信息的製圖專家系統建立了一個思維框架。

sentences.english: He's an architectural draftsman in the office where I work.
sentences.chinese: 他是位建築製圖員，和我同辦公室工作。

sentences.english: Equal-area projections are preferred for statistical mapping.
sentences.chinese: 等面積投影通常均優先用於統計製圖。

definition: a slip of a pen/CL:處|处[chu4]
important matter that must be kept secret (idiom); don't breathe a word of it to anyone!
